name: Angel's Love
detailed_description:
Jeremy, while teleporting through the worlds, had missed his carefully planned destination point and happened to find himself in the same bed with a human girl he sees the first time in his life.. Not to say that he finds her rather loud, always hungry for food and over emotional kind of girl. None of his sisters or any other angels have even been that straightforward in their opinions in his life! That's kind of... refreshing.

Follow the adventures of Aya and Jeremy, both his sisters and other angels who are dealing with saving the Heaven and Earth from the Demon. Would they ever be able to call their home save yet again? Will they find a peace and happiness? Will they.. survive?

"Angel's Love" is a visual novel featuring

  • linear & rather short storyline
  • nice background music & sounds
  • both Earth & Heaven worlds
  • Steam achievements

short_description: Aya, living a regular life of a regular girl, once in the morning wakes up and finds a mess of red hair and white feathers in her bed... Is this guy an angel? And what is he doing in her bed?
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsXP
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
